puppet.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a model of a person or animal that you move by pulling wires or strings, or by putting your hand inside it
puppet.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a person or organization that allows other people to control them and make their decisions
puppet.translation[0].definitions[1].not: puppet government/regime/state (=a government etc controlled by a more powerful country or organization)
puppet.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The government is in danger of becoming a mere puppet of the military.
